name: Shanks
text: DON!! X1 When Attacking: You may trash 1 character card from your hand. Give up to 1 of your opponent's characters Power -1000 for the turn. Then, draw a card.

effect.text: You may trash 1 character card from your hand. Give up to 1 of your opponent's characters Power -1000 for the turn. Then, draw a card.
